content: 37 w&t round 2 k1 kfb knit to 2 sts before end of needle 1 kfb k1 repeat row 4 purl 28 32 36 w&t across needle 2 continue working this way knitting or purling to 1 stitch before last repeat these two rounds until you have 34 38 42 sts on each needle for wrap then wrapping and turning the unwrapped stitch until you have a total of 68 76 84 sts 10 11 12 wrapped stitches at the beginning of each knit and purl side row to check your work you should have 12 14 16 unwrapped knit 1 more round stitches in the center knit 2 4 6 sts pm knit 30 pm knit 2 4 6 sts row 1 knit to the first wrapped knit stitch w&t that stitch again chart section row 2 purl to the first wrapped purl stitch w&t that stitch again row 3 knit back to the stitch you wrapped in row 1 the first double begin working colorwork chart 1 pg 3 wrapped stitch knit the wrapped stitch together with both of its wraps charts can be worked using standard colorwork ladder back as in a k3tog w&t the next stitch for a second time row 4 purl back to the stitch you wrapped in row 2 pick up and purl the jacquard or duplicate stitching video tutorials for each technique wrapped stitch together with both of its wraps as in a p3tog w&t the have been provided pg 1 for this pair i knit most of the tube of next stitch again the foot marked my beginning round and end rounds with a strand of contrasting yarn and used duplicate stitching instead of knitting repeat row 3 and 4 until you have worked all but one of the double in the design wrapped stitches the last purl side stitch will remain ending by completing a right side row whatever your preference is for how to work the charts absolutely you will address the last stitch in the leg portion fuck ice and everything they stand for leg foot begin working the leg in plain stockinette working the last double removing stitch markers as you go work a single decrease round wrapped stitch as you reach it decrease round k1 k2tog knit to last three stitches on the first if you need additional space for the calves as you work up the leg you needle ssk k1 repeat on second needle 64 72 80 sts can insert an increase round as follows increase round k1 kfb knit to 2 sts before end of needle 1 kfb measure the length of the toe of the sock this will determine when you k1 repeat across needle 2 will begin the heel if the toe measures 1 5 you will start the heel 1 5 short of your overall foot length cuff and finishing example if the total foot measures 10 and the toe measures 2 you when you reach your desired length begin
